<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get task by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/box/{scope}/task/{task_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get the details about a specific task, used to poll
the current progress of a task

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"scope","in":"path","description":"Scope the task is within","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"task_id","in":"path","description":"ID of the task to query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"x-tenant-id","in":"header","description":"ID of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"x-tenant-env","in":"header","description":"Environment of the tenant you are targeting","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Task found successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a stored asynchronous task progress","required":["id","document_box","status","created_at"],"properties":{"completed_at":{"type":["string","null"],"format":"date-time"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the task was created"},"document_box":{"type":"string","title":"String","description":"ID of the document box the task belongs to"},"id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique ID of the task"},"output_data":{"description":"Output data from the task completion"},"status":{"description":"Status of the task","type":"string","enum":["Pending","Completed","Failed"],"title":"TaskStatus"}},"title":"Task"}}}},"404":{"description":"Task not found","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"HTTP error JSON format for serializing responses","required":["reason"],"properties":{"reason":{"type":"string"}},"title":"HttpErrorResponse"}}}},"500":{"description":"Internal server error","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"HTTP error JSON format for serializing responses","required":["reason"],"properties":{"reason":{"type":"string"}},"title":"HttpErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
